pkgmetadata.longdescription: Self-Determination Theory Measures // Functions for self- determination motivation theory (SDT) to compute measures of motivation internalization, motivation simplex structure, and of the original and adjusted self-determination or relative autonomy index. SDT was introduced by Deci and Ryan (1985) doi:10.1007/978-1-4899-2271-7. See package?SDT for an overview.
